Cardhead unfortunately doesn't realize that his posts are the worst in the =
RPG, so he hasn't a right to try to put down anyone else's.

If he was more=
 worried about the RPG instead of bashing me, his posts wouldn't suck so mu=
ch...


=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=3D=

Cardhead
  ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
  From: cardhead649 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Mo=
nday, August 05, 2002 7:48 AM
  Subject: Re: ooC: people...


  I'll stop w=
hen they do.  But Rauq, even you have to admit that HNC's 
  inaugural rp p=
ost wasn't worth the time it took to read the first 
  line, let alone the =
whole thing.  And Lurker's start-up is the most 
  over-dramatized entrance=
 I've ever seen - all you need is a shot of 
  Dr. Frankenstein throwing a =
switch and it's a ripoff of every single 
  horror movie out there.  

  It=
's improved somewhat since then.

  As far as characters are concerned, Ter=
minion and 
  Skullertron/Slaughter actually display both personality and 
=
  potential.  The remaining four have been cannon-fodder thus far.

  That'=
s my opinion and it's up to you guys to prove me right or wrong 
  by rolep=
laying, not bitching.  And this is a serious RPG, not a 
  slapstick movie,=
 so if I see another post/exchange like HNC's first 
  one, where everyone =
involved is an absolute idiot, I will ingore 
  every post thereafter made =
by the perpetrator(s) regardless of who 
  they are or think they are.

  -=
-- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:

around for those wondering. Megatron is waiting 
  in

 for the Predacons, most of which are 'busy' or

n't have much to post about right now, but I

sts up till when i last checked em.
  >

e in, cause this obviously aint 
  > getting better, it's getting worse. *r=
aises verbal shields*
  > 
  > First think that needs to happen is a cease =
fire in this flame war 
  > between cardhead, lurker, and narrator. it star=
ted wrong right from 
  > the start. certain things which shouldn't have be=
en said, were 
  said, 
  > and the replies were less than sucessful at def=
using the situation 
  > and it blew up. 
  > 
  > cardhead, if you don't l=
ike Narrator's posting style, that's your 
  > problem. Telling him that yo=
u don't like it, with a bunch of 
  > senseless slander isn't going to make=
 him post the way you'd like 
  > him to post.
  > 
  > Narrator, keep ooc =
comments out of your posting, if you want to say 
  > something, say it and=
 no pot shots. And I find it really hard to 
  > believe that you managed t=
o put 'piece of dog shit' and 'grow up' 
  in

  >

 > If anyone wants to grow up, then they should shut up about this

pid arguement, and get back to role playing. Nothing anyone can

w short of an appologies and 'I'm being quiet', can show me

e is growing up.
